long_description: A great entry-level wired bike computer, the Sigma Sport BC 5.12 gives you the basics so you can get the most out of your training rides without distraction or excess information. Easy-to-read monitor with one-touch button to scroll through displays. Automatic start/stop lets you forget about the clock and focus on your ride. In scan mode the display automatically scrolls through the display options so you consistently get a full set of information. Display includes distance and current speed; trip time or clock display is one push of a button away. Features include 7 available languages, watertight casing and tool free installation. Sigma Sport BC 5.12 Bike Computer includes 1 CR2032 battery.
